mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cate(cateno, grp, name, cnt, seqno, visible, rdate) VALUES(CATE_SEQ.nextval, #{grp}, #{name}, 0, #{seqno}, #{visible}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT cateno, grp, name, cnt, seqno, visible, rdate FROM cate ORDER BY seqno ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE cate SET seqno=seqno-1 WHERE cateno=#{cateno}
UPDATE cate SET seqno=seqno+1 WHERE cateno=#{cateno}
UPDATE cate SET visible='Y' WHERE cateno=#{cateno}
UPDATE cate SET visible='N' WHERE cateno=#{cateno}
mapper.select: SELECT cateno, grp, name, cnt, seqno, visible, rdate FROM cate WHERE name='--' AND visible='Y' ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT cateno, grp, name, cnt, seqno, visible, rdate FROM cate WHERE grp=#{grp} AND name != '--' AND visible = 'Y' ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT grp FROM cate WHERE name = '--' ORDER BY seqno ASC

SELECT cateno, grp, name, cnt, seqno, visible, rdate FROM cate
WHERE (UPPER(grp) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%') OR (UPPER(name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY seqno ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM cate
WHERE (UPPER(grp) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%') OR (UPPER(name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY seqno ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE cate SET cnt = cnt - #{cnt} WHERE grp=#{grp} and name='--'
